name: COFFEE
description: Enjoy our signature hot or iced coffee, freshly brewed and customizable to your taste. A perfect start to your day or a midday treat.

name: DONUTS
description: Indulge in our classic, freshly-made donuts. Each one is a fluffy, delicious delight, topped with a variety of glazes and sprinkles to satisfy your sweet tooth. A perfect companion for your coffee.

name: TEA
description: Sip on a cup of our premium, aromatic tea, available hot or iced. Choose from a selection of flavors to find your perfect blend, offering a refreshing and soothing experience with every drop.

name: COFFEE AND COLD BREW
description: A small, medium or large hot or iced coffee or Cold Brew.

name: BITES & BAGELS
description: A Wake-Up WrapÂ® with or without meat, or a bagel with spread.

name: NON-COFFEE DRINKS
description: A small, medium or large Dunkin' Refresher, Hot Chocolate or hot or iced Chai Latte or Matcha Latte.

name: BREAKFAST SANDWICHES
description: A breakfast sandwich with your choice of meat, egg, cheese and bread.

name: ESPRESSO AND FROZEN DRINKS
description: Any size frozen drink or hot or iced espresso drink.
